definition: in good health
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
sickness
safe and sound (idiom)/to come out unscathed (e.g. from an accident or illness)
(literary) I trust you have been well since we last met
see 安然無恙|安然无恙[an1 ran2 wu2 yang4]

sentences.english: No lives were lost, and we could wade ashore in safety.
sentences.chinese: 人都安然無恙，我們都能平安地涉水上岸。

sentences.english: Soft but safe Yin Shi Zu, never mind to break up with him.
sentences.chinese: 石柔只求尹祖平安無恙，絕不介意與他分手。

sentences.english: He ran behind the wall anxiously, but Peter was all right.
sentences.chinese: 他急忙跑到那堵牆後面，發現彼得安然無恙。

sentences.english: I eased her mind by telling her that the children were safe.
sentences.chinese: 我告訴她孩子們平安無恙，讓她安心。

sentences.english: We marvel(l)ed that they had escaped unhurt.
sentences.chinese: 我們感到驚奇的是他們竟安然無恙地逃了出來。

sentences.english: As long as the user is clicking and buying, all is well.
sentences.chinese: 只要用戶點擊廣告，購買商品，一切都會安然無恙。

sentences.english: We all heaved a sigh of relief when we heard that they were safe.
sentences.chinese: 當替考聽說他們安寧無恙時，都鬆了一語氣。

sentences.english: I eased her mind by telling her that the children are safe.
sentences.chinese: 我告訴她孩子們平安無恙，讓她安心。

sentences.english: When they saw that I did not sicken they grew afraid.
sentences.chinese: 當他們見到我安然無恙的時候，便開始害怕了。

sentences.english: Teri assures Kim that it was only a cyst and that she is fine.
sentences.chinese: 泰瑞叫金姆放心，只是一個囊腫而已，她無恙。

sentences.english: Thanks to the doctor, I am safe and sound once again.
sentences.chinese: 多虧了那位大夫，我現在才又安然無恙了。

sentences.english: May he come back safe and sound!
sentences.chinese: 但願他平安無恙的回來。

sentences.english: She shook her head. "No, disciple, you cannot rest just yet."
sentences.chinese: 保好頭腳不受涼，其餘部位可無恙。

sentences.english: After the triumphant return, can again unscarred?
sentences.chinese: 而凱旋歸來後，是否可以別來無恙？

sentences.english: Your mother will be anxious until she hears you're safe.
sentences.chinese: 你媽媽只有在聽到你安然無恙時纔會放下心來。

sentences.english: After all the commotion she is safe and sound .
sentences.chinese: 喧鬧過後，她平安無恙，世貿沒被拉倒。

definition: Wan Li (1916-2015), PRC politician
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
far away/thousands of miles/10000 li
beautiful
who would have thought/unexpectedly
unintentionally/not in the mood to
desolate (place)
unmanned/uninhabited
distant/remote/far/far away
to visit places famous for their scenery
wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
to fall and wither (like autumn leaves)/(fig.) drifting and homeless
whence/where
the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
to inspect one by one/to list individually
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
